summary_reasoning: The Council UNANIMOUSLY APPROVES this critical infrastructure fix. The previous backtest engine was fundamentally flawed (Data Leakage). Moving to Walk-Forward Optimization (WFO) is the only path to scientific validity. Expect performance metrics to drop to zero initially; this is a feature, not a bug.

role_verdicts.QuantResearcher: APPROVE. WFO is the gold standard. Ensure training window > 1 year.
role_verdicts.RiskOfficer: APPROVE. Better to know we are losing 0% than to believe we make 40% and blow up.
role_verdicts.CodeAuditor: APPROVE. Ensure clear separation of indices.
role_verdicts.RealismChecker: APPROVE. Welcome to the real world.
role_verdicts.IntegrationEngineer: APPROVE. Note: Scoreboard will need a reset.

next_steps: Run comprehensive_validation.py to confirm 100% OOS purity.
